description: Debridement/drainage/lavage for specific conditions (Evidence: pg no: 10, L482-L487)
scope: Treatment of specific knee conditions (Evidence: pg no: 10, L481-L489)

documentation: ALL of the following conditions: Rheumatoid arthritis with failure of medical management (DMARDs), Septic joint or osteomyelitis, Septic prosthetic joint, or Postoperative arthrofibrosis with limited range of motion and failure of at least 6 weeks of conservative management (Evidence: pg no: 10, L483-L487)

exclusions: Debridement or lavage for isolated primary diagnosis of osteoarthritis of the knee (Evidence: pg no: 10, L489)

codes.description: Arthroscopy, knee, surgical; for infection, lavage and drainage (Evidence: pg no: 16, L700)
